org.bremersee.fac.domain

Interface FailedAccessDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FailedAccessInMemoryDao, FailedAccessJpaDao, FailedAccessLdapDao

    public interface FailedAccessDao

    DAO of a failed access entry.

    Author:
    Christian Bremer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count(String searchValue)
      Counts the failed access entries.
      List<? extends FailedAccess> find(String searchValue, Integer firstResult, Integer maxResults, org.bremersee.comparator.model.ComparatorItem comparatorItem)
      Returns the requested failed access entries.
      List<? extends FailedAccess> findObsolete(long removeFailedAccessEntriesAfterMillis)
      Returns obsolete failed access entries.
      FailedAccess getById(Serializable id)
      Returns the failed access entry with the specified ID or null if there is no such entry.
      FailedAccess getByResourceIdAndRemoteHost(String resourceId, String remoteHost)
      Returns the failed access entry with the specified resource ID and remote host.
      boolean removeById(Serializable id)
      Removes the failed access entry with the specified ID.
      boolean removeByResourceIdAndRemoteHost(String resourceId, String remoteHost)
      Removes the failed access entry with the specified resource ID and remote host.
      FailedAccess save(FailedAccess failedAccess)
      Saves the failed access entry and returns the persisted instance.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        FailedAccess save(FailedAccess failedAccess)
        Saves the failed access entry and returns the persisted instance.
        Parameters:
        failedAccess - the failed access entry
        Returns:
        the persisted instance

      • getById

        FailedAccess getById(Serializable id)
        Returns the failed access entry with the specified ID or null if there is no such entry.

      • getByResourceIdAndRemoteHost

        FailedAccess getByResourceIdAndRemoteHost(String resourceId,
                                          String remoteHost)
        Returns the failed access entry with the specified resource ID and remote host. If there is no such entry, null will be returned.

      • removeById

        boolean removeById(Serializable id)
        Removes the failed access entry with the specified ID.

      • removeByResourceIdAndRemoteHost

        boolean removeByResourceIdAndRemoteHost(String resourceId,
                                        String remoteHost)
        Removes the failed access entry with the specified resource ID and remote host.

      • count

        long count(String searchValue)
        Counts the failed access entries.
        Parameters:
        searchValue - a search value (can be null)
        Returns:
        the size

      • find

        List<? extends FailedAccess> find(String searchValue,
                                  Integer firstResult,
                                  Integer maxResults,
                                  org.bremersee.comparator.model.ComparatorItem comparatorItem)
        Returns the requested failed access entries.
        Parameters:
        searchValue - a search value (can be null)
        firstResult - the first result number (starting with 0, can be null)
        maxResults - the maximum size (can be null)
        comparatorItem - a comparator item for sorting (can be null)
        Returns:
        the found failed access entries

      • findObsolete

        List<? extends FailedAccess> findObsolete(long removeFailedAccessEntriesAfterMillis)
        Returns obsolete failed access entries.
        Parameters:
        removeFailedAccessEntriesAfterMillis - a threshold in millis
        Returns:
        the obsolete failed access entries
